```{.r .cell-code}

                 layer = "Hunan")
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan2012 <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_GDPPC <- left_join(hunan,hunan2012) %>%
  select(1:4, 7, 15)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(hunan_GDPPC) +
  tm_fill("GDPPC",
          style = "quantile",
          palette = "Blues",
          title = "GDPPC") +
  tm_borders(col = "grey") +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of GDP per capita by country, Hunan Province",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 1.2,
            legend.height = 0.45,
            legend.width = 0.35,
            frame = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex05_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
wm_q <- hunan_GDPPC %>%
  mutate(nb = st_contiguity(geometry),
         wt = st_weights(nb,
                         style = "W"),
         .before = 1)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
moranI <- global_moran(wm_q$GDPPC,
                       wm_q$nb,
                       wm_q$wt)
glimpse(moranI)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
List of 2
 $ I: num 0.301
 $ K: num 7.64
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_moran_test(wm_q$GDPPC,
                  wm_q$nb,
                  wm_q$wt)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Moran I test under randomisation

data:  x  
weights: listw    

Moran I statistic standard deviate = 4.7351, p-value = 1.095e-06
alternative hypothesis: greater
sample estimates:
Moran I statistic       Expectation          Variance 
      0.300749970      -0.011494253       0.004348351 
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_moran_perm(wm_q$GDPPC,
                  wm_q$nb,
                  wm_q$wt,
                  nsim = 99)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Monte-Carlo simulation of Moran I

data:  x 
weights: listw  
number of simulations + 1: 100 

statistic = 0.30075, observed rank = 100, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: two.sided
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lisa <- wm_q %>%
  mutate(local_moran = local_moran(
    GDPPC, nb, wt, nsim = 99),
    .before = 1) %>%
  unnest(local_moran)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(lisa) +
  tm_fill("ii") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tm_view(set.zoom.limits = c(6,8)) +
  tm_layout(
    main.title = "local Moran's I of GDPPC",
    main.title.size = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex05_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(lisa) +
  tm_fill("p_ii_sim") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tm_layout(
    main.title = "p-values of local Moran's I",
    main.title.size = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex05_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
map1 <- tm_shape(lisa) + 
  tm_fill("ii")+
  tm_borders(alpha=0.5)+
  tm_layout(main.title="p-value",
            main.title.size=2)

tmap_mode("plot")
map2 <- tm_shape(lisa) + 
  tm_fill("p_ii_sim")+
  tm_borders(alpha=0.5)+
  tm_layout(main.title="p-value",
            main.title.size=2)

tmap_arrange(map1, 
             map2, 
             asp=1, #Aspect Ratio
             ncol=2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex05_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lisa_sig <- lisa %>%
  filter(p_ii < 0.05) #filter only significant p values

tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(lisa)+
  tm_polygons()+
  tm_borders(alpha=0.5)+
tm_shape(lisa_sig)+
  tm_fill("mean")+
  tm_borders(alpha=0.4)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex05_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
wm_idw <- hunan_GDPPC %>% 
  mutate(nb = st_contiguity(geometry) ,
         wts = st_inverse_distance(nb, geometry,
                                  scale = 1,
                                  alpha =1),
         .before = 1)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
HCSA <- wm_idw %>% 
  mutate(local_Gi = local_gstar_perm(
    GDPPC, nb, wt, nsim = 99),
    .before = 1) %>% 
  unnest(local_Gi)
HCSA
```
